creator: franksun@hotmail.com
text:
I have installed apache 2.0.45 at linux. IE always explores chinese web pages at  
ISO charater coding. But when I install apache 1.3.27 it is works well at
chinese coding.
Can anyone check it?

Thank you

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This almost surely means that you are not sending the correct content-encoding
HTTP response header for these files.  See the AddEncoding directive.
